org.swat.server.game.interaction
Interface IGameInteraction

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameInteractionManager
public interface IGameInteraction

The main interaction point with the server. This class abstracts the details of the server from the game and the game from the server.

Author:
steve

createGame

                     java.lang.String playerUID)
Creates a new game

Parameters:
gameID - the UID of the game to create a new instance of
playerUID - the player UID who is creating the game instance
Returns:
the current state of the newly created game instance

java.util.Collection<GameState> getGamesThatNeedPlayers()
Returns the list of all games currently in the CREATED state

Returns:
all the games that need more players

Parameters:

Returns:

Gets the current state of a game instance

Parameters:

Returns:

                   java.lang.String playerUID)
Join a game instance

Parameters:
gameInstanceID - the ID of the game instance to join

Returns:
